content.html:
I just copied your name from model TEST. There it is the same.

TEST_F(ModelTest, PluginInfoFailures) { this->Load("worlds/shapes.world", true);

auto world = physics::get_world("default"); ASSERT_TRUE(world != nullptr);

auto model = world->GetModel("box"); ASSERT_TRUE(model != nullptr);

ignition::msgs::Plugin_V plugins; bool success; common::URI pluginUri;

gzmsg << "Model has no plugins" << std::endl; { pluginUri.Parse("data://world/default/model/box/plugin/"); model->PluginInfo(pluginUri, plugins, success);

EXPECT_TRUE(success);
EXPECT_EQ(plugins.plugins_size(), 0);

}

So what do you think?
